dataset.title: Calosoma aethiops (Jeannel, 1940) as a new synonym of Calosoma imbricatum hottentotum Chaudoir, 1852, a new status of Calosoma roeschkei Breuning, 1927, and a revision of the Calosoma senegalense group sensu Haeckel, 2012 (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Carabini)

abstract.para: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Haeckel, Martin, Farkac, Jan, Sehnal, Rostislav (2016): Calosoma aethiops (Jeannel, 1940) as a new synonym of Calosoma imbricatum hottentotum Chaudoir, 1852, a new status of Calosoma roeschkei Breuning, 1927, and a revision of the Calosoma senegalense group sensu Haeckel, 2012 (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Carabini). ZooKeys 609: 11-28, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.609.6822, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.609.6822

intellectualRights.para: To the extent possible under law, the publisher has waived all rights to these data and has dedicated them to the Public Domain (CC0 1.0). Users may copy, modify, distribute and use the work, including for commercial purposes, without restriction.

gbif.citation: Haeckel M, Farkac J, Sehnal R, pensoft (2016). Calosoma aethiops (Jeannel, 1940) as a new synonym of Calosoma imbricatum hottentotum Chaudoir, 1852, a new status of Calosoma roeschkei Breuning, 1927, and a revision of the Calosoma senegalense group sensu Haeckel, 2012 (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Carabini). Plazi.org taxonomic treatments database. Checklist dataset https://doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.609.6822 accessed via GBIF.org on 2023-08-28.
